SELECT mn_pay_dvs , mn_use_dvs_det , sum(mn_amount) as sum_amount , (select detail_name from tb_detail_code where detail_code = mn_use_dvs_det) as detail_name FROM tb_mn
WHERE mn_use_dvs = #{mn_use_dvs}
AND mn_upd_id = #{loginId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(mn_upd_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(mn_upd_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY mn_pay_dvs
GROUP BY mn_use_dvs_det
ORDER BY sum(mn_amount) desc

select mn_upd_dtm, sum(mn_amount) as sum_amount from tb_mn where mn_upd_id = #{loginId} and mn_use_dvs = 1 and mn_pay_dvs = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(mn_upd_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(mn_upd_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by mn_upd_dtm
